Una de las necesidades que la  señora  Carla  atraviesa, es la necesidad de Comprar materiales de construcción como: zinc, zinc liso, cemento, arena, hierro 3/8 y mano de obra, para Reparar el techo y construir una viga de cemento,  Por lo que ha tomado la decisión de acudir a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de lo antes mencionado, y de esa manera mejorar sus condiciones y nivel  de vida familiar.
texts.en:
In the town of Larreynaga, in Leon department, Señora Carla works as a teacher in a small primary school. She has been dedicated to this work for 9 years, and is a single mother of one son, who depends on her.

Señora Carla needs to buy building materials such as zinc, cement, sand, and iron, and the labour to repair her roof and install a concrete beam. She has decided to seek a loan from Ceprodel to pay for these, and thereby improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy cunstruction materials such as zinc, cement, sand, and iron, and the labour, to improve her roof and install a concrete beam.

loans.name: Odelia

texts.es:
Odelia tiene 36 años, es una mujer seria, pero muy trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su hijo, a quien cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Ahuaycha.  
Sus días lao dedica al negocio de compra y venta de queso. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de moldes de este producto, los cuales lleva a los mercados de las diferentes ciudades de la costa del país. Por ese motivo, no tiene mucho tiempo para dedicarlo a su tienda de comestibles, ya que viaja constantemente y regresa a su casa después de varios días. Pero como ella es una mujer inteligente, se asoció con una señora, quien cuida de su tienda y también pone capital de trabajo. De esa manera, Odelia no se preocupa de administrarla, ya que su socia siempre le informa sobre los problemas que ocurre y ya cuando ella regresa se reincorpora al trabajo.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nuevo amanecer” y este es su segundo crédito con MFP. En todo este tiempo pudo aumentar sus ganancias, pues obtuvo el capital para trabajar. Por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, además de que le agrada pertenecer a su grupo donde las personas son responsables y solidarias.
Odelia invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más productos de primera necesidad para la tienda de comestibles que tiene.
texts.en:
Odelia is 36 years old. She is a serious woman, and a hard worker. She lives with her son, whom she looks after in their own home located in the town of Ahuaycha. 

Her days her spent in the business of buying and selling cheese. Her job is to buy moulded cheeses and take them to the markets in different cities on the coast. This leaves her with little time devote to her grocery store, as she travels constantly and is often away for several days at a time. But since she is an intelligent woman, she has set up a partnership with a woman who minds her store and has invested her own money in it. Thus, Odelia need not worry about managing it, as her partner always tells her about any problems that occur when she returns to work there.

She belongs to the "New Dawn" communal bank and this is her second loan with MFP. Throughout this time she has been able to increase her profits, thus building up her capital. She therefore promises to make her repayments on time. She likes belonging to the group, as people are responsible and look out for each other. 

Odelia will invest the money in buying more staples for her grocery store.

loans.use: To buy more everyday goods for her grocery store.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 32 años, vive en compañía de sus dos hijos: Maryorid y Carlos, a los que cría con mucho esmero y amor en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Ahuac.  
Su principal negocio es su tienda de comestibles, con la que tiene 3 años de experiencia. Asimismo, hace poco empezó brindado el servicio de internet, tiene 11 computadoras para que los pobladores de su localidad puedan conectarse con todo el mundo. Y como buena mujer del campo, también siembra en terrenos que le heredaron sus padres, su principal sembrío es la linaza, una especia de plata que sirve para preparar bebidas naturales con propiedades curativas. Todas estas actividades las desarrolla con toda normalidad, ya que es una mujer  muy trabajadora. En esta oportunidad desea incrementar los animales que tiene. Pues otras de sus actividades es la crianza de cuyes y cerdos, a los que todos los días alimenta y cuida con mucha dedicación. Ha acondicionado unos establos y corrales acorde a los animales, a los que después de su maduración los vende a los carniceros que visitan su casa, pues muy conocida. 

Este es el crédito número 15 con MFP y agradece el apoyo recibido en todo este tiempo, pues gracias a ello pudo incrementar su capital y tener un negocio estable. Por esa razón, promete ser puntual con el pago de la cuotas, pues se siente feliz de pertenecer a su grupo, que lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. 
Carmen invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más cerdos para incrementar su número y ventas.
texts.en:
Carmen is 32 years old and lives with her two children, Maryorid y Carlos, who she loves with lots of enthusiasm and adoration. They live in their own home in the town of Ahuac.
Her main business is a grocery store with 3 years of experience. Recently she started a business that offers internet access. She has 11 computers for the townspeople to connect to the world-wide-web.She is also a good field worker and cultivates land she inherited from her parents. She mainly grows flax seeds, a type of plant used for natural drinks with healing properties. She works with ease with all of these jobs because she is a hard worker. She wants to take this opportunity to have more animals which is another one of her activities consisting of raising guinea pigs and pigs. She feeds them every day and dedicates a lot of time to them. She built stables and corrals to keep the animals in and once they are mature sells them to butchers that visit her house. 
This will be her 15th loan with MFP and she is very thankful for the support received all of this time since she was able to invest in her business and make it stable. This is why she promises on being punctual with the loan payments. She is happy being a part of this group formed of responsible and united people.
Carmen will use the loan to buy more pigs to grow her business and increase profits.

loans.use: buy more pigs

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia tiene 28 años, está casada, pero actualmente sólo vive con sus dos hijos (Jairo y Kiara), porque su esposo trabaja como obrero en una mina lejos de su localidad. Su casa es propia y está ubicada en el distrito de Chilca. 
El arte lo lleva en la sangre, desde niña aprendió a tejer, su madre le enseñó todas las técnicas del tejido, por eso convirtió su mejor pasatiempo en su medio de vida. El tejido de gorras, chompas y conjuntos es su actividad económica, todos los días recibe a sus clientes quienes le hacen pedidos, pues conocen de su destreza. Debido al trabajo de su esposo, sólo está en casa pocos días una vez al mes. “Es el esfuerzo que tiene que realizar para brindarnos una mejor calidad de vida”, afirma ella con optimismo. Por ello Cecilia espera que dentro de muy poco pueda ampliar su negocio, generar buenas ganancias y de esa manera tener a su familia unida.  Ya se encuentra dando el primer paso y muy pronto abrirá una tienda de comestibles cerca a su casa, pues alquiló un espacio cómodo y con buena ubicación.

Este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera concretar sus planes. Por otro lado, promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su grupo, porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias.
Cecilia invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mercadería para surtir su nueva tienda de comestibles que está segura, será un éxito.
texts.en:
Cecilia and 28 years old, married, but at the moment lives only with her two children (Jairo y Kiara), because her husband is working as a minor far from their town. They own their home which is located in the Chilca district.
Art runs through her veins. She learned how to knit. Her mother taught her all the techniques for knitting. This is why she turned her favorite hobby into a business. She knits hats, sweaters, suits and every day has clients that make orders.
Due to her husband's work he is only home a few days a month. “That is the sacrifice he had to make in order to offer us a better quality life,” she confirms with optimism. That is why she is hoping to grow her business soon, to increase profits, and have a united family. This is her first step and soon will open a shop close to her home. She rented a comfortable place in a good location.
This is her first loan with MFP and hopes to make her plans concrete. On another note, she promised to pay back the loan. She also likes being a part of the group since the members are responsible and united people.
Cecilia will use the loan to buy merchandise to stock her new grocery store which she is sure will be a success.

loans.use: buy merchandise to stock her new grocery store

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
En el municipio de Larreynaga departamento de León, La señora Ana se dedica arduamente a la labor como maestro de primaria, en un pequeño colegio de un poblado  del municipio, dedicándose a esa labor desde hace 24 años, es Soltera  con 1 hijo a los que tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para su desarrollo.
Una de las necesidades que la  señora  Ana atraviesa, es de mejorar sus condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de acudir a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como, Perlin, Zinc, Cemento, Hierro y Puerta.  para realizar las mejora en la casa, para mayor seguridad de su vivienda. Por medio de esta obra brindará mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the town of Larreynaga, León department, Mrs. Ana is a passionate elementary teacher. She teaches in a small school from a populated town. She has been a teacher for 24 years, single, and has 1 son who she has to raise.
One goal Mrs. Ana has is to improve her living conditions since they are poor. This is why she requested Ceprodel a loan to buy construction materials such as purline beams, zinc sheets, cement, iron, and a door. This will improve the security of her home and offer her children better living conditions.

loans.use: purlin beams, zinc sheets, cement, iron, and a door.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
Teodora tiene 46 años, es una buena mujer, muy sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo y su hija Luvitza, a la que cría en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Ahuaycha. 
Como mujer de campo se dedica a sembrar y criar animales. Esta actividad, como ella refiere, es su principal pasatiempo, gusta mucho de lo que realiza, por ello, no duda en que podrá salir adelante y ampliar sus siembras, como también mejorar en la crianza de animales. Pero en esta oportunidad, el capital de trabajo lo destinará para su tienda de comestibles, la cual tiene desde hace muchos años en su casa, todos los pobladores de su localidad la conocen y todas las mañanas visitan su negocio para poder comprar los alimentos que consumirán durante el día. Ella vende todo tipo de verduras, panes, leche y demás comestibles, por ello constantemente viaja a la ciudad a comprar lo necesario para abastecer su negocio. Ahora desea ampliar su tienda, surtirla más y convertirla en una de la mejores del pueblo. 
Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nuevo amanecer” y este es su crédito número 7 con MFP. En todo este tiempo pudo aumentar sus ganancias, pues obtuvo el capital para trabajar. Por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, además le agrada pertenecer a su grupo donde las personas son responsables y solidarias.
Teodora invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Teodora 46 years old and is a good and simple woman. She lives with her husband and daughter Luvita who she raises in their own home located in Ahuaycha.
As a female farmer she cultivates the land and raises animals. She considers farming to be her main hobby and has no doubts in being able to succeed and amplify her crops as well as improve the way she raises her livestock.
However, this loan will be used for her grocery store which she has had in her home for many years. All the townspeople know about her store and every morning visit it. She sells all types of vegetables, bread, milk, as well as other products. She is constantly going to the city to buy merchandise for her store. Now she wants to expand her shop, stock it up more, and make it one of the best in town. 
She belongs to the group called “New Morning” and this is her seventh loan with MFP. During that time she was able to increase profits then had the money to work. She promises to be punctual with the loan payments. She likes being a part of the group where the people are responsible and united.
Teodora will use the loan to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.use: buy merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Sabina tiene 62 años, está casada con Ricardo, tienen 10 hijos, pero sólo viven con uno de ellos; Juan Carlos, al que crían en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Ichicruz. 
Nació en el campo y cuando conformó su familia no dejó de sembrar y criar animales, gracias a su trabajo pudo obtener todo lo que hoy posee. Su principal ingreso económico es la crianza de cerdos y ovejas, las que cuida con mucha dedicación. En las mañanas sale muy temprano para cuidar de sus animales, los lleva a pastar a los inmensos prados de la zona, donde se nutren de pastos naturales; ya al atardecer, a la puesta del sol, regresa a guardarlos en su establo, donde espera pacientemente que vuelva a amanecer para poder cuidarlos y así hasta que estén maduros, luego los vende a los carniceros en la feria de la ciudad. Ella desea para su futuro poder incrementar su ganado y así tener más ganancias para el futuro.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nuevo amanecer” y este es su crédito número 7 con MFP. En todo este tiempo pudo aumentar sus ganancias, pues obtuvo el capital para trabajar. Por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, además le agrada pertenecer a su grupo donde las personas son responsables y solidarias. 
Sabina invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado ovino.
texts.en:
Sabina is 62 years old, married to Ricardo, has 10 children, but only lives with 1; Juan Carlos. He is being raised in their home located in Ichicruz.
She was born in the country and her family continued cultivating the land and raising animals. Thanks to the businesses they have everything they now own. Her main source of income is raising pigs and sheep which she takes lots of care of.
She goes out very early in the mornings to take care the animals. She takes them to the pastures in the area where they graze. In the evenings at sunset she goes out to bring them back to the stable. She patiently waits for morning to arrive to take care of them and continues to look after them in such manner until they are mature. She then sells them to butchers in the city fair. She wants to have more livestock to increase income.
She belongs to the group called “New Morning” and this is her seventh loan with MFP. During that time she was able to increase profits then had the money to work. She promises to be punctual with the loan payments. She likes being a part of the group where the people are responsible and united.
Sabina will use the loan to buy cows.

loans.use: buy cows

loans.name: Irene Martha

texts.es:
Irene es una mujer de 67 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, por diversas circunstancias desde hace muchos años decidió divorciarse de su esposo, tiene 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores, ella es una mujer muy alegre que siempre ha trabajado y luchado por sacar adelante a su familia; en sus ratos libres le gusta salir de comprar por las calles de la ciudad e incluso en algunas ocasiones compra una deliciosa pizza, las cuales le agradan mucho.
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y por iniciativa propia, Irene se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas y chocotejas, ella trabaja todas las noches fuera de su casa un aproximado de 6 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 45 clientes; ella cree que su negocio marcha bien debió a su buena sazón, carisma y trato amable. 
Irene se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindad podrá realizar la compra de un carrito sanguchero, ya que ella cuenta con uno desde hace varios años y éste ya presente desperfectos y requiere ser cambiado; de esta manera Irene podrá mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos y así poco a poco espera poder juntar suficiente para terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Irene is 67 years old, lives in the city of Ica, divorced, and has three children. She is a very cheerful woman who is always working hard to improve her family's life. During her free time she like to go shopping in the city and occasionally likes to buy pizza which she likes very much.
Thanks to her hardworking spirit and her initiative she sells hamburgers and chocolates for a living. She works every night outside her house for approximately 6 hours and can attend up to 45 clients. She believes business is going well because she cooks very well, has charisma, and treats clients well.
Irene is very thankful for the Kiva lenders because she will be able to buy a sandwich cart to replace an old one she has and can increase profits so that little by little she can save up enough money to finish building her house.

loans.use: buy a sandwich cart

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
El señor Jorge es maestro de primaria de un colegio de la comunidad de larreynaga, del que tiene 19 años de ejercer dicha actividad, es soltero con 1 hijo al que tiene que brindarle las condiciones  necesarias para su formación académica, actualmente tiene una necesidad de reparar su vivienda la que tiene en mal estado. Por tal razón se decidió visitar a ceprodel para ser 
Beneficiado con un financiamiento  y poder efectuar es sueño de mejorar su vivienda con dicho crédito lo invertiría en la compra de materiales de construcción como: Zinc, Perlin, Ladrillos, Cemento, Puerta y Mano de obra. Para mejorar el techo, pared y las puertas las que están en mal estado y de esa manera mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Jorge is a primary school teacher in Larreynaga community, where he has been teaching for 19 years. He is single with one child, who he has to provide with education. He currently needs to repair his home which is in poor condition. Therefore, Jorge decided to visit Ceprodel, to benefit from the loan opportunity and to be able to achieve his dream of improving his house. His loan will be invested in the purchase of building materials such as: Zinc, purlins, bricks, cement, doors, and also labor costs. He wants to improve the roof, walls and doors which are in poor condition and thereby he will improve the living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as zinc, purlins, bricks, cement, doors, and labor costs.

loans.name: Rosalia De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Rosalía es maestra de primaria de un colegio de la localidad de larreynaga,  la jornada laboral la pasa rodeada de niños los que merecen la atención necesaria para su formación académica,  su estado civil es casada con 3 hijos los que tiene el derecho de proporcionarles las condiciones para su desarrollo profesional. Actualmente tiene la necesidad de mejorar su vivienda la que tiene en mal estado, por tal razón decidió visitar las oficinas  de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento y poder comprar los materiales de construcción como: Hierro 3/8, Hierro ¼, Zinc, Bloques, Alambre de amarre, Clavos de Zinc, Cemento, reglas y Mano de Obra. Para efectuar la obra de mejoramiento de pared y techo y poder lograr el objetivo percibido para mejorar las condiciones y nivel de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Rosalia is an elementary school teacher in the town of Larreynaga. At work, she spends her time being surrounded by children who deserve the right attention in order to develop their educational background. Rosalia is married with 3 children, and needs to provide them with good foundations for their professional development. 

Currently, Rosalia needs to improve her home which is in poor condition. Therefore, she decided to visit the Ceprodel office to apply for a loan to buy building materials such as 3/8" and 1/4" iron, zinc, blocks, wire, nails, cement, and labor. She will repair the walls and ceiling to achieve her goal of improving living conditions and quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase 3/8" and 1/4" iron, zinc, blocks, wire, nails, cement, and labor.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 30,000 to boost her cosmetic selling business. With the loan, she plans to purchase facial creams, hair weaves, and hair oil. Since her previous loan, her monthly income has increased, and she plans to expand to another business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase facial creams, hair weaves, and hair oil.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 59-year-old a business lady and a single mother of two adult children.  She has been running a medical clinic for the past 19 years with a monthly income of KES 20,000, which she uses to support her family. 

Mary is applying for her first loan with KADET after being introduced by a KADET staff member. She will use the loan to purchase a piece of land for future use. With the anticipated profit from the clinic business she will educate her children. 

She hopes to build rental houses and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land.

loans.name: Vilma Haydee

texts.es: Vilma Haydee de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Miguel su hija de siete años, sus padres y su hermana; ella se dedica a la venta de lácteos: crema, requesón, queso, entre otros, tiene varios años de poseer este negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, sus ventas las realiza en diferentes zonas y desde su hogar, pero la mayor venta la realiza de forma ambulante, ya tiene mucha clientela fija porque saben que todo lo que comercia  es de calidad, higiénico a buenos precios y con un servicio excelente; Vilma es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene muchas metas que desea alcanzar y está dispuesta a lograrlo, desde hace mucho tiempo quiere aumentar sus ventas pero necesita de capital para la compra de insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar por mayor: leche, crema, requesón, etc. Vilma Haydee es muy responsable y tiene muy buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que cancelará el financiamiento en el tiempo establecido y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Vilma Haydee is twenty eight years old. She lives with MIguel, her life's companion, her seven year old daughter, her parents and her sister. She sells dairy products: cream, cottage cheese, cheese and more. She has had this business for several years and it has had good results. She sells in different areas  and from her house. She does most of her sales as a street vendor. She has a lot of regular customers because they knew that every thing she sells is of good quality, hygenic and well priced with good service.Vilma is an enterprising woman who really wants to get ahead. She has a lot of goals to reach and she is willing to do it. For a long time she has wanted to increase her sales but she needs capital to buy products. That is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy milk, cream, cottage cheese, eetc. wholesale. Vilma Haydee is very responsible and has very good payment references. She is certain she will pay off the loan on time and also give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy milk, cream and cottage cheese.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos de 44 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa  y 5  hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Cada año realiza la siembra de los principales granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. Dicha actividad la repite año con año ya que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingreso. Es un hombre emprendedor el cual además de los cultivos también se dedica a la crianza de ganado.  De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su sueño es mejorar  su calidad de vida  y la de su familia ya que viven en condiciones muy humildes y desea darles algo diferente.  Esto lo motiva a trabajar con más entusiasmo ya que solo con el trabajo logrará dar a su familia mejores condiciones a las que actualmente posee. Son éstas razones para acercarse  a INTEGRAL, y solicitar este crédito que le permita invertir en los insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para el cultivo de la tierra ya que son indispensable para obtener una cosecha abundante,  y así continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera lograr su objetivo de dar a su familia lo que se merece y poder accesar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carlos is 44 years old. He lives in his the house he owns with his wife and 5 children. He has worked as a farmer for many years. Every year he plants basic grains such as corn and beans. He repeats this activity every year since it is one of his main sources of income. He is an enterprising man who in addition to his crops also raises cattle. This is how he earns his living and supports his home. His dream is to improve his and his family's quality of life since they live in very humble conditions and he wants to give them something different. This is what motivates him to work more enthusiatically, sin ce it is only thourgh his work that he will be able to give his family a better quality of life than it has now. These are his reasons for going to INTEGRAL and asking for this loan. This will allow him to invest in farming materials (seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.) necessary to cultivate the soil, have an abundant harvest, and bring home the daily bread. He hopes to meet his goal to give his family everything it deserves and be able to access a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesús

texts.es: Manuela de Jesús tiene 46 años de edad, y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos y su madre. Desde hace muchos años se dedica a la agricultura  principalmente de maíz y arroz. Además de esta actividad que año con año realiza también se dedica a la venta de productos naturales. Es una mujer increíble la cual se caracteriza por ser muy luchadora, emprendedora, responsable y sobre todo generosa. Gracias a su buen desempeño en su trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales la aprecian y prefieren ya que siempre cuenta con productos de calidad y a muy buenos precios. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la siembra como: abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc. ya que son indispensables para obtener un excelente cosecha. Confía en Dios y en la ayuda de esta institución que logrará obtener una cosecha favorable 2012 que le permitirá continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Manuela de Jesús is 46 years old. She lives in her own home with her three children and her mother. For several years she has worked in agriculture, mainly with corn and rice. In addition to this activity that she does year after year, she also sells organic products. She is an incredible woman who is characterized as being a fighter, an entrepreneur, repsonsible and above all generous. Thanks to her hard work she has been able to gain the confidence of her neighbors who appreciate her and prefer her because she always has quality products at very good prices. Because the planting season has already started, she has decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in buying the materials she needs, such as: fertilizer, seeds, insecticide, etc. These are indispensable to obtain an excellent harvest. She trusts in God and in this intitution's help in getting a favorable harvest in 2012 which will allow her to keep bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy: fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Cruz María

texts.es: Cruz María tiene 36 años de edad y habita junto a su esposo, un hijo de 14 años y una hija de 9 años. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda. Desde hace algunos años logro establecer una pequeña tienda en la cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: verduras, cereales, frutas, productos alimenticios y productos de limpieza. Trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia, y darles mejores condiciones a las que por el momento tienen. Ella es uno de los  principales soportes económicos de su familia, por lo que necesita mantener su negocio activo, ya que este les proporciona gran parte de los ingresos necesarios para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Es una mujer increíble, la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas las cuales día con día la prefieren más. Atiende su negocio con una sonrisa y con mucha amabilidad ya que para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que ofrece, con el objetivo de seguir siendo la preferida de sus vecinos y clientes. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería (arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, café, plátanos, macarrones, golosinas, productos de limpieza, etc.) para surtir  su negocio y poder atraer a más clientes que le permitan incrementar su nivel de ventas y sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Cruz María is 36 years of age and lives with her husband, her 14-year-old son and her 9-year-old daughter. She sells goods in a store. A few years ago she managed to open a small store, where she sells a variety of staple goods such as vegetables, cereals, fruit, food products and cleaning products. She works very hard to ensure that her family gets ahead, and to give them better conditions than those they currently have. 

Cruz María provides one of the main financial supports for her family. She therefore needs to keep her business going, as this provides them with a large share of the income that they need to maintain their household. She is an incredible woman who has won the trust of many people who, as each day goes by, prefer to buy from her. In her business she always works with a smile and is very friendly, as she thinks the most important thing is that her customers are happy with the service she offers. In this way, she will remain the favorite of her neighbors and customers.

Cruz María has requested this loan from INTEGRAL to buy merchandise (rice, beans, oil, sugar, coffee, bananas, pasta, candies, cleaning products, etc.). She will use these products to supply her business and attract more customers, which will increase her sales and her income.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, coffee, bananas, pasta, candies, cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: José Samuel

texts.es: José Samuel tiene 31 años y habita junto a su familia en casa de su propiedad.  Él se dedica  a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Esta actividad la realiza año con año y es así como logra llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. José es un hombre  increíble ya que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajador, positivo y responsable.  Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que  conoce muy bien la manera de hacer esta activada. Cada año realiza esta actividad de la cual vende una parte de su cosecha y la otra la deja para consumo. Es así como da a su familia el alimento básico y lo necesario. Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia, esto lo hace tomar mas fuerzas para seguir luchando por un futuro diferente. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles ya que son muy importantes para tener una cosecha abundante, la cual le permita continuar satisfaciendo las principales necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en:
José Samuel is 31 years of age, and lives with his family in his own house. He works in agriculture, mainly growing corn and beans. He works in this way year after year, and this is how he provides for his family on a day-to-day basis. 

José is an incredible man as he is known to be very hard-working, positive and responsible. He has worked in agriculture for many years, and therefore knows how to carry out the activities involved. Each year he works in this area, selling part of his harvest and keeping the rest for his personal use. This is how he gives his family the basic food they need. He lives in very humble conditions with his family, which gives him the strength to fight for a different future. 

José has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies (seeds, compost, insecticides, etc.). He will use these supplies to grow corn and beans, as they are very important to have an abundant harvest. This will allow him to continue to provide his home with basic necessities.

loans.use: To buy seeds, compost, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Maura Abigail

texts.es: Maura Abigail tiene 53 años de edad, habita junto a su familia desde hace muchos años. Maura  se caracteriza por ser emprendedora, responsable pero sobre todo trabajadora. Con mucho esfuerzo a logrado mantener su negocio el cual consiste en la elaboración y venta de tortillas.  La venta  la realiza  en su hogar de habitación, a los clientes y vecinos de la zona donde habita. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos  y es uno de los principales soportes económicos de la familia. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya tiene mucha experiencia en el mismo. Gracias a su carisma se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con varios clientes fijos. Maura trabaja muy duro para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Su sueño es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por lo que se esfuerza para que su negocio siga funcionando de la mejor manera posible. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de  la materia prima necesaria como: maíz. Cal, gas propano, etc. para la elaboración de las ricas tortillas que día a día produce y con lo cual logra llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Todo esto lo hace con el fin de abarcar una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar sus niveles de venta y de ganancias y por consecuencia poder lograr su sueño de dar a su familia  diferentes y mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Maura Abigail is 53 years of age, and has lived with her family for many years. She is an enterprising, responsible and above all hard-working woman. She works hard to keep her business going, preparing and selling tortillas. She sells her produce at home to customers and neighbors from the area in which she lives. 

This business is the main source of income for Maura Abigail’s family. She has worked in this business for many years, and therefore has lots of experience. Thanks to her charisma she has earned the trust of many people in the area, and as a result has many regular customers. Maura works very hard to help her family get ahead. Her dream is to improve her quality of life and that of her family, and she works very hard to ensure that her business continues to run as best as possible.

Maura has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy the raw materials she needs, such as corn, quicklime, propane gas, etc. She uses these ingredients to prepare the delicious tortillas she makes on a daily basis, which she uses to provide for her household every day. She has done this to increase demand, which will generate more sales and income and, as a result, allow her to realize her dream of giving her family different and better opportunities in life.

loans.use: To buy corn, quicklime, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra Elizabeth de treinta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos una de nueve, uno de seis y uno de tres años; ella posee una venta de totoposte, comida tradicional al oriente del país, que son unos pequeños panes tostados hechos a base de maiz y que no contienen azucar, y tiene varios años de tener su pequeño negocio, está ubicado en la segunda planta del mercado municipal de la zona y es muy conocida ya que tiene gran simpatía con las personas que visitan el mercado y con sus compañeros vendedores, últimamente  se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues saben que lo que comercia es rico, de calidad y a precio bajo además del buen servicio; Sandra es una mujer visionaria con muchos propósitos a futuro, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades, quiere aumentar la producción porque aumento la demanda por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar insumos como maíz por mayor, sal, aceite, etc. Sandra Elizabeth tiene buen record crediticio y tiene la confianza que pagará la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra Elizabeth is 30 years of age, and lives with her life partner and three children aged nine, six and three. She sells totopostes, which are a traditional food in the east of the country and are small pieces of toasted, sugar-free corn bread. 

She has worked in her small business for several years. It is located on the second floor of the town market in the area, and is well-known as Sandra Elizabeth is very friendly to the people who visit the market and her fellow vendors. She has recently had many customers as they know that she offers delicious, high-quality and affordable produce, and that she provides a good service. 

Sandra is a visionary woman with many goals for the future, and is always on the lookout for new opportunities. She wants to increase her production as demand is now higher, and has therefore requested a loan from Integral. With this loan she will buy supplies such as wholesale corn, salt, oil, etc. Sandra Elizabeth has a good credit history, and is sure that she will repay her loan on time, while providing her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale corn, salt and oil.

loans.name: Norma Azucena

texts.es: La señora Norma es originaria de un poblado del municipio de león, actualmente se desempeña como maestra de primaria en un colegio de la misma localidad, es casada con 1 hijo  al que tiene que mantener y darles las condiciones necesarias para su desarrollo, la señora norma actualmente tiene una necesidad bien importante en el mejoramiento de su vivienda. Por eso decidió visitar las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiada con u financiamiento y lograr el objetivo, ya que dicho crédito lo quiere para comprar materiales de construcción como: Ladrillo bloque, cemento, perlin, zinc y mano de obra con lo que construirá  la ampliación de la cocina, para mejorar sus condiciones y nivel  de vida.
texts.en:
Norma is originally from a town in the municipality of León. She currently works as an elementary school teacher in a school in her town. She is married and has one son, and wants to provide for her family and ensure they have the conditions they need to get ahead.

Norma urgently needs to make some improvements to her home. She therefore decided to visit Ceprodel officials to request a loan to meet this goal. She plans to use the loan to buy construction materials such as bricks, cement, purlins and corrugated metal sheets, and to pay for labor expenses. She will use this to extend her kitchen and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, purlins and corrugated metal sheets, and to pay for labor expenses.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a 47-year-old business woman. She is married to Joseph, who is employed, and they are blessed with two children. She has been running a driving school for the past 10 years, producing a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses for her family’s basic needs. 

She is applying for her second loan with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. Agnes will use the loan to service the school's trucks and to buy chairs and tables. With the anticipated profit from the business she will improve her business. 

She in future hopes to open more branches of the driving school.

loans.use: to service the trucks and to buy chairs and tables for her driving school.

loans.name: Abdukholik

texts.ru: Более 4-х лет Абдухолик занимается купле- продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Живет вместе с женой и пятерьмя детьми, из них трое несовершеннолетних. Жена домохозяйка, занимается  домашними делами. Его дружная семья помогает ему по ведению бизнеса. На полученную прибыль от  данного бизнеса он содержит семью. Данный момент он имеет 3 голов крупного и 40 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Абдухолик запрашивает займ для покупки мелкого и крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения и увлечения поголовье скота. Он надеется на вашу доброту  щедрость.
texts.en:
Abdukholik has been buying and selling cattle and livestock for more than four years.  He lives with his wife and five children, three of whom are still minors.

His wife is a homemaker; she takes care of the household.  Abdukholik's loving family helps him with his business.  Thanks to the profits from this business, he is able to provide for them.

Abdukholik currently owns 3 head of cattle and 40 head of smaller livestock.

He is requesting a loan to purchase livestock and cattle in order to expand and increase his herd.  He is looking forward to your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Jose Lazaro

texts.es: José Lázaro de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, adicional a esta labor vende ganado bovino, y trabaja de jornal por un pequeño salario, es muy conocido en la localidad donde reside pues realiza labores agrícolas en todo el lugar; José comercia en los alrededores, se ha hecho de mucha clientela ya que todo lo que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre emprendedor muy visionario, tiene grandes expectativas para el futuro y se está esforzando para ser un comerciante de mayoreo, quiere invertir para aumentar la producción del maíz y frijol en casi dos manzanas de terreno pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, etc. José Lázaro tiene buenas recomendaciones de pago y es muy responsable, está seguro que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
José Lázaro is 46 years old and lives with his spouse and their two children in their own home.  He grows corn and beans and has done so for many years with great results.  He also sells cattle and works for a small salary.  He is well-known in the town where he lives and has worked in agriculture in many areas in the region.  José sells his products in the surrounding areas and he has acquired many customers because everything he sells is of the highest quality at low prices.  He also provides excellent customer service.

José is a visionary and an entrepreneurial man.  He has great expectations for the future and is working toward becoming a wholesale merchant.  He wants to invest in his business so that he can increase his corn and bean yields in almost two acres of land, but he needs money to do so.  Therefore, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.  

José Lázaro has great references and he is very responsible.  He is certain that he will be able to repay his loan and be able to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides.

loans.name: Peninah

texts.en:
Peninah is a 50-year-old mixed crop farmer and married to Joseph, who is also a farmer.  They are blessed with three children. For the past ten years, the farming business has been her primary business and tailoring secondary, with a monthly income of KES 8,000, which she uses to support her family. 

Peninah is applying for her second loan term with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. She will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. 

She hopes to boost her tailoring business and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Sakina is a resident of Kisauni, Kenya. She previously applied for a Kiva loan of 25,000 Kenya shillings, which was approved, and has made a second Kiva application of KES 20,000. With the previous loan, she was able to expand her poultry business to meet her customers' needs. Sakina therefore wants to purchase more chickens and poultry feed. She believes this will give her a better competitive edge and enable her to open other types of businesses in the future.

loans.use: To purchase more chickens and poultry feed.

loans.name: Perpetual

texts.en:
Perpetual is 47 years old and married to Moses, who is employed. They are blessed with three children. She has been running a medical clinic for the past 20 years, with a monthly income of KES 20,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan with KADET, after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Perpetual will use the loan to purchase a piece of land. With the anticipated profit from the clinic business she will educate her children. 

She in future hopes to build rental houses and to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a 50-year-old business woman, married to Simon, who is employed, and they are blessed with three adult children. She has been running a medical clinic for the past 15 years, with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan with KADET, after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Ann will use the loan to purchase a piece of land. With the anticipated profit from the clinic business she will educate her children. 

She in future hopes to build rental houses and to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en: Sylvia  is married and has two children, who all go to school. She also takes care of additional family members, including her father. She has a retail shop and has been in this business for 10 years. She has applied for a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and jerry cans of cooking oil. She doesn’t have any other income-generating activity. Her major business challenges include transportation, thieves, and the ever-increasing price of commodities. She aspires to grow her business so that she owns a fully stocked retail shop and also to become a wholesaler and to build her own house. She lives in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity but not to running water. Her monthly expenses include rent, food, and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and jerry cans of cooking oil.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de catorce años; él se dedica a la venta de lácteos queso, crema, leche, además vende verduras, tomates, cebollas, chiles etc., tiene varios años con el pequeño negocio y está ubicado en el mercado municipal de la zona donde reside, al oriente del país, es muy conocido por los clientes y por los demás vendedores del mercado pues es un hombre muy simpático y amable además que comercia producto de calidad  y a precios realmente accesible; Eduardo es muy visionario, tiene muchos objetivos a futuro y piensa cumplirlos todos porque es muy perseverante; quiere estar adelante de su competencia por eso quiere invertir en más insumos pero necesita de capital ya que sus compras las realiza al contado, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lácteos por mayor, queso, crema, leche, requesón etc e incrementar así sus ganancias. Eduardo es muy responsable y tiene muy buenas referencias crediticias por eso tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo le dará a su familia un vida plena.
texts.en:
Eduardo lives with his spouse and their 14 year old son.  He sells dairy products such as cheese, cream, and milk.  He also sells vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, peppers, etc.  For many years he has run a small business in the city marketplace in the east of the country, where he resides.  He is well-known by his customers and by the other merchants in the marketplace because he is a very nice and friendly man.  Furthermore, he sells high-quality products at reasonable prices.  

Eduardo is a visionary and has many future goals.  He wants to reach all of his goals and he's very persistent.  He wants to remain ahead of the competition and so he wants to invest in more merchandise but he needs money to do so (and only cash payments are accepted).  Therefore, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy more dairy products such as cheese, cream, milk, cottage cheese, etc.  With these items, he will be able to increase his earnings.

Eduardo is a very responsible man with great references.  He is certain that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time he will be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, milk, and cottage cheese.

loans.name: Muturirwa Group

texts.fr:
Pascal fait partie du groupe Muturirwa et habite à  Rumonge, commune sous la supervision de la branche de Bujumbura. Il  a 46  ans et est marié à Genèse. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants, âgés de 3  à 20 ans, dont  4 étudient.

il fait le commerce d’huile de palme depuis  19 ans. 

C’est son premier crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de  bidons d’huile de palme à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait entreprendre le commerce de boutique et faire l’élevage de chèvres, et  voir ses enfants continuer les études.
texts.en:
Pascal is a member of the Muturirwa group and lives in Rumonge, a commune under the supervision of Bujumbura. He is 46 years old and married to Genèse. The couple have 6 children together, aged between 3 and 20, 4 of whom go to school.

Pascal has been selling palm oil for 19 years. This is his first loan from Turame. His Kiva-sponsored loan will increase his capital and he will buy many cans of palm oil for resale, so that he can earn more. In the years ahead, he would like to open a shop and breed goats, and watch his children progress in their studies.

loans.use: to buy many cans of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas una de dieciocho y otra de diecinueve años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de lácteos y verduras como queso, crema, tomates, cebolla, papa, entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en el mercado de la localidad donde vive, tiene varios años de poseer esta venta y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; Marta es una mujer dedicada a su labor, muy activa siempre está a la disposición de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan crecer, ha aumentado la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a su clientela, por lo que desea invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar queso, crema, requesón, tomates, cebolla chiles, etc. Marta tiene una moral intachable y es muy responsable asegura que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marta lives with her spouse and their two daughters (18 and 19 years old).  She sells dairy products and vegetables, such as cheese, cream, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, and more.  She has a stall in the market in the town where she lives.  For many years she has worked at this job and she had many excellent customers because she always carries what they need.  Her products are of the best quality at the lowest prices and she provides great customer service.

Marta is a very dedicated woman, she is very active, and she is always looking for new opportunities that allow her to grow.  Demand has increased and she doesn't want to let her customers down.  Therefore, she wants to invest in merchandise but needs the money to do so.  She is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy cheese, cream, cottage cheese, tomatoes, onions, peppers, etc.

Marta has a high moral character and she is very responsible.  She is sure to repay her loan and at the same time she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, cottage cheese, tomatoes, onions, and peppers.

loans.name: Pedro De Jesus

texts.es: Pedro de Jesús de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite realizar cada día mejor su labor, siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola y cercano a su vivienda, se levanta desde muy temprano a comerciar su producto en todos los alrededores, ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios bajos además Pedro se caracteriza por su amabilidad en el servicio; es un hombre entregado a su labor, lleno de sueños que está dispuesto a cumplir porque quiere alcanzar un futuro más próspero, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita comprar insumos agrícolas por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Pedro de Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago, es honesto y responsable está seguro que logrará saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Pedro de Jesus is twenty-eight years old and lives with his life companion and children. He earns his living through agriculture and in particular the cultivation of corn and sorghum. He has been working in this area for many years and has gained valuable experience which allows him to perform his work better every day. He always gets the best harvests. 

His farmland is located in an agricultural area and is close to his house. He gets up very early to sell his products to the whole area. He already has many customers because they know everything he sells is of excellent quality and at low prices and because Pedro is characterized by his friendly customer-service. He is a man who is dedicated to his work. He has many dreams which he is eager to fulfill because he wants to have a more prosperous future. 

It is the seeding season and he wants to increase production, but he needs to buy agricultural supplies. For this reason he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow him to be corn seen, sorghum, manure, insecticide, tools etc. Pedro de Jesus has good payment references, is honest and responsible. He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and at the same time provide his family with financial security.

loans.use: buy corn seeds, sorghum, manure, insecticide, tools.

loans.name: Liduvina Concepcion

texts.es: Liduvina Concepción de treinta años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijos José y Julio, ella posee una venta de verduras, tomates, cebollas, chiles, papas, entre otros, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y está contenta porque le ha dado muy buenos resultados, está ubicado en un instituto cerca de la localidad donde reside, el lugar es muy concurrido de personas por eso se ha hecho de clientela además que todo lo que vende es de calidad a precios accesibles, Liduvina es una mujer activa, muy visionaria que desea alcanzar la cima, y está trabajando duro para lograrlo, en los últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda, quiere invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verdura por mayor, tomate, cebolla, chile, papa, ejotes etc. Liduvina Concepción tiene buen record crediticio sabe que podrá saldar con éxito el financiamiento y  a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Liduvina Concepción, 30-years-old, lives with her two sons José and Julio.  She has a shop of vegetables like tomatoes, onions, chilis, and potatoes, among others.  She has had the business for several years and is happy because it has given her good results.  It is located in an institute near the town where she lives.  The place is very crowded with people, which is why she has many customers, as well as all that she sells is of good quality at affordable prices.  

Liduvina is an active woman, a visionary who wants to reach the top and is working hard to achieve it.  In the last months her demand has increased, so she wants to invest in supplies but needs the capital.  This is why she asks INTEGRAL for a loan that allows her to buy wholesale vegetables like tomatoes, onions, chilis, potatoes, beans, etc.  Liduvina Concepción has a good credit record and knows that she could successfully settle the financing and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale tomatoes, onions, chilis, and beans.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is aged 29 and has been in farming for six successive years in his rural home of western Kenya, where he lives with his family of two children aged five and two. His farm produces milk, maize, and other horticultural crops, which he sells to the local market.  He adds that he gets additional income from his trade of livestock animals.

Simon has requested a loan of 75,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to help him venture into the poultry farming business. He plans to buy poultry for 35,000 KES and to build a housing unit for the birds at 40,000 KES.  He reiterates that he will use both dairy and poultry as his core businesses and use the income to ensure his children get a quality education.

Simon, however, points out that a lack of capital, unreliable rains, and animal diseases are the inherent problems in farming, which farmers must learn to manage in order to succeed.

loans.use: to buy poultry and build a poultry housing unit.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a resident and farmer in the Kitale area of Western Kenya and has been practicing mixed farming for over twelve years with maize, milk and beans being his main produce for the local market. He is married with four children, aged between fifteen and eight years and all schooling.

Simon has requested a loan of 80,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help boost both his poultry and dairy farming. He says he will buy additional poultry birds for 40,000 KES and build a modern dairy unit on his dairy farm. He is also planning to increase his farm income through the purchase of more land.

He laments the poor roads network and the rampant fluctuation in milk prices. However he remains appreciative of Juhudi Kilimo for its efficiency in its financial services.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds and a build a dairy unit.

loans.name: Nicodemus

texts.en:
Nicodemus is a resident of Kitale and has had thirteen successive years in farming, with dairy and poultry being his main supply to the local markets. He is married with seven children who are all adults save for the last born child who is still schooling.

Nicodemus has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to expand his poultry farming business. He adds he will buy more birds and build a better housing unit for his flock to ensure they are well protected. He reiterates that farming has been his family's source of livelihood and that he is optimistic the expansion will make it much better.

However, he says the poor roads network and diseases are the leading challenges in farming in the area, with the former calling for government intervention, as farmers are highly exploited by the transporters.

loans.use: To expand his poultry farming.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente  est entrepreneur dynamique, leader du groupe d’affaire Ufalme, âgée de 43 ans, mariée, mère de 9 enfants parmi les quels, deux ont leurs propres foyers et sept vont à l’école.  Son conjoint est un fonctionnaire dans l’administration publique. La  cliente  est vendeuse de jus local communément appelé  Madrakwa. Il ya plusieurs années qu’elle exerce cette activité.  Elle vient de faire 11 cycles en bénéficiant régulièrement  le crédit de l’IMF  Hekima, pour  renforcer  son capital. Dit-elle que sa famille de la cliente vit de cette activité d’autant plus que les fonctionnaires de l’Etat congolais ne sont pas régulièrement payés et quand ils sont payés, ils reçoivent de rémunération très médiocre qui ne leurs permet pas de couvrir l’ensemble de tout le mois ni de faire une épargne. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner  avec  des nouveaux intra (matières premières) pour la fabrication de ce jus mandrakwa (5 sacs maïs, 50 kg millet, 50 kg farine, 50 kg sorgho, bois de chauffage, etc.).  En plus, elle ambitionne pérenniser  son entreprise et scolariser dignement ses enfants. La cliente  remercie l’IMF Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées aux pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.Il sied de signaler que, l’une des clientes porte un bébé au dos.
texts.en:
The client is a dynamic entrepreneur and the leader of the business group Ufalme. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of 9 children, 2 of whom have their own households and 7 of whom go to school. Her spouse is a civil servant employed by the public administration.

She sells local juice commonly known as "Madrakwa". She has been in this line of work for many years. She has completed 11 loan cycles, regularly reinforcing her capital with credit from the IMF Hekima. Her family lives on the earnings generated by her business, especially as the State's civil servants are not paid on a regular basis, and when they are paid, they receive a very small salary which does not enable them to cover the month's expenditures, let alone build savings. This new loan will be used to buy new ingredients (raw materials) used to make Madrakwa juice (5 sacs of corn, 50 kg of millet, 50kg of flour, 50kg of sorghum, firewood, etc.). She also aims to sustain her business and to ensure her children get a proper education.

The customer would like to thank Hekima for its actions in aid of impoverished women excluded from regular bank lending channels.

Note: one of the customers is carrying a baby on her back.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacs of corn, 50 kg of millet, 50kg of flour, 50kg of sorghum, firewood, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 50 years old and a business lady. She is married to Leonard, who is employed. They are blessed with five children aged 23, 21, 20, 16 and 10 years respectively. She has been running a medical clinic for the past 15 years with a monthly income of about KES 25,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term with KADET after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Nancy will use the loan to purchase a piece of land for future use. With the anticipated profit from the clinic business she will educate her children. 

She hopes to build rental houses and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land.

loans.name: Bounkiling Grand Dakar Group

texts.fr:
CES FEMMES FONT PARTIE DU GROUPE FAISANT UN DÉMEMBREMENT DU BANC VILLAGEOIS ENCADRE PAR CAURIE MICRO-FINANCE. IL A ÉTÉ CRÉÉ LE 04 AOUT 2006. ELLES HABITENT TOUTES LE MÊME QUARTIER. ELLES S'ACTIVENT DANS LE PETIT COMMERCE.

MADAME DIENABA QUI EST A LA DROITE DE LA PHOTO LEVANT LA MAIN EST L'EMPRUNTEUR EN VEDETTE. ELLE EST MARIÉE ET MÈRE DE 05 ENFANTS. ELLE EST ÂGÉE DE 36 ANS.

ELLE DÉVELOPPE UN PETIT COMMERCE DE LÉGUMES. ELLE COMPTE S'APPROVISIONNER DANS LES MARCHES DES GRANDE VILLE ENVIRONNANTES EN LÉGUMES, LAIT ET SUCRE POUR VENIR REVENDRE DANS SA PROPRE VILLE.

ELLE VA ACHETER EN QUANTITÉ DE L'OIGNON, DE L'AILE, DU CHOUX ETC...

LES BÉNÉFICES TIRES DE SON ACTIVITÉ SERVIRONT A PAYER LE SCOLARITÉ DE SES ENFANTS ET DE CONTRIBUER AUX DÉPENSES FAMILIALES.
texts.en:
These women are members of a group which is part of the "banc villageois" supervised by Caurie Microfinance. The group was created on the 4th of August, 2006. The members of the group live in the same district and are small retailers.

Dienaba, on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is the featured borrower. She is 36 years old, married and the mother of 5 children. She is developing a small vegetable retail business. She plans to get supplies of vegetables, milk and sugar at the markets of the big, surrounding towns and to resell them in her own town. She will get a large quantity of produce including onions, garlic and cabbages. The profits from her business will be used to pay for her children's education and to contribute to the family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, milk and sugar.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa y sus dos hijos. Desde hace muchos años aprendió a cultivar la tierra, esta actividad es la que ahora le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Cada año cultiva los principales granos básicos como maíz y maicillo. Es un hombre increíble el cual lucha por dar a su querida familia una realidad diferente a la que tienen, habita en condiciones  muy sencillas y humildes. Se gana la vida trabajando duramente la tierra, cuando tiene la cosecha lista, la comercializa en los principales punto de venta del lugar donde habita. Tiene muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos ya que él es un hombre trabajador, responsable, generoso y positivo. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para la siembra, ya que son muy importantes para tener una cosecha abundante y poder continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y poco a poco lograr su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lorenzo lives in his own home with his wife and their two children.  Many years ago he learned how to cultivate the land.  This is what now enables him to bring home money to support his household.  Every year he grows basic grains such as corn and millet.  He is an incredible man who struggles to give his loving family a different life than the one they currently have.  They live in very basic and humble conditions.  

He earns a living working on the land.  When the harvest is ready, he sells his products in the marketplaces in the region where he lives.  He has great references, including his neighbors.  They say he is a hard-working man who is responsible, generous, and positive.

He is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of agricultural items that are necessary (seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.) for planting.  They are very important so that he will have an abundant harvest and will be able to continue bringing home the bread every day.  Little by little he is able to achieve his dream of improving the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is an 18-year-old single man who has been working at fixing and selling glass for eight years. He opened his own business in 2010. Hassan was only ten years old when he had to quit childhood and get involved in a business field in order to help support his family. He misses his childhood, and that's why he works hard to develop his business - to make sure that his future family, if he has one, won't suffer the same as he did.

Hassan applied for a Youth Loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy a big quantity of glass from the wholesale market to expand his business. This loan will help a lot in expanding his business, and will surely increase his income. He hopes to diversify glass colors and types to fit with customers' needs.

loans.use: To buy a big quantity of glass from the wholesale market to expand his business.

loans.name: Mubariz

texts.en:
Mubariz is 45 years old. He lives in a small village with his family: his wife, Elmira, who is involved in trade, his 17-year-old son and his parents. The family is busy with agricultural activities. They have 4 milk cows. Mubariz and his wife produce cheese and sell it in nearby villages. Also, Elmira purchases greens from local farmers and sells them on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 950 Lari. 

Mubariz requested a loan for purchasing calves. He will grow the calves and sell them after several months with a price markup. As a result of the above mentioned activities, the income of the family will increase. With the increased amount of profit he will expand his agricultural business. Mubariz hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Daniel Matías

texts.es: Daniel Matías tiene 34 años de edad y desde hace muchos años se dedica a cultivar la tierra.  Con mucha dedicación cultiva maíz y maicillo, lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable. Habita junto a su  grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus tres hijos de 11, 9 y 5 años de edad. Junto a su esposa trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y darles mejores condiciones a las que ellos han tenido. Gracias a los conocimientos en la agricultura es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar, que es su principal fuente de ingresos, dado que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente.  Con muchos deseos de superación se acerco a esta institución para solicitar crédito ya que la temporada para la siembra comenzó y es necesario iniciar la siembra lo antes posible. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita el crédito ya que necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para la siembra. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá accesar a una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Daniel Matías is 34 years old and for many years he has worked on the land.  With a lot of dedication, he grows corn and sorghum, which enables him to bring home the bread.  He is known as a hard-working, honorable, and responsible man.  He lives with his family which includes his wife and their three children that are 11, 9, and 5 years old.  He works with his wife every day so that they can get ahead and enjoy better living conditions than they have had in the past.

Thanks to his knowledge in agriculture, he is able to support his household.  His work is their main source of income and the only way he knows how to make an honest living.  With dreams to excel, he is seeking a loan before the planting season begins, as it is necessary to prepare the earth as early as possible.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies (seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.) for the planting.  He trusts God and believes that with his hard work he will have an abundant harvest which will allow him to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Konstantin

texts.en:
Konstantin is 40 years old. He lives in the Rustavi District in East Georgia with his family: his wife, Ketevan, who is busy with agricultural activities, two children (13 and 15 years old) and a mother, who is a pensioner. Both of the children go to the local school. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a milk cow, one calf, 4 pigs and 21 hens. All adult family members are busy during the day on the family farm.  They produce dairy foods, mainly cheese and yogurt, also eggs, and sell them in nearby villages. The total average monthly income of the family is 750 Lari. 

Konstantin requested a loan for purchasing calves. After the calves are grown the family will be able to produce and sell more dairy food. This will increase the income of the family, and they will be able to spend more on satisfying their daily needs and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Soboulde Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Sobouldé a été créé le 17 Mai 2011 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois. A ce jour 35 femmes ont bénéficié d’un prêt. Elles habitent toutes le même village. Elles font toutes le petit commerce et la fabrication de savon traditionnel. Il existe une parfaite solidarité entre les femmes. 

Madame Rougui transformatrice et vendeuse de savon traditionnel est l’emprunteuse vedette (assise à extrême droite avec la main droite levée), elle est mariée, mère de quatre enfants dont trois garçons. 

Malgré ses soixante-deux ans elle reste très dynamique, par exemple pour fabriquer trente-six savons il lui faut : vingt-cinq litre d’huile, deux kilogramme de « khémé » substance chimique et cent vingt-cinq gramme de farine. 

Le produit fini est venu à cent vingt-cinq francs CFA l’unité. Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter en quantité les intrants pour la fabrication de savon. La vente se fera en grande partie dans le village et le reste dans les marchés hebdomadaires  des villages environnants. 

Les bénéfices lui permettront de participer activement aux charges familiales et à la scolarité de sa fille de onze ans et du garçon de neuf ans.
texts.en:
The Sobouldé group was created on the 17th of May, 2011, on the inauguration date of their "banc villageois". To date, 35 women have benefited from a loan. They all live in the same village. They are all small retailers and make traditional soap. The women enjoy a perfect solidarity.

Rougui, sitting on the far right with her right hand raised , is a producer and seller of traditional soap, and the featured borrower. She is married and the mother of 4 children, 3 of whom are boys. Despite her 62 years of age, she remains a dynamic woman. To make 36 bars of soap, for example, she needs 25 litres of oil, 2 kg of « khémé », a chemical substance, and 125g of flour. The finished product is sold for 125 francs per unit. This new loan will allow Rougui to buy a large quantity of the ingredients she needs to make soap. Her sales will mostly be made in the village, with some soap being sold at the weekly markets of the surrounding villages. The profits will enable her to actively participate in the payment of the family expenses, including the educational expenses of her 11-year-old daughter and her 9-year-old son.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of the ingredients used in soap-making.

loans.name: Martha Lucia

texts.es: La señora Martha es Maestra de Primaria de  Profesión, actualmente se desempeña como Director de un centro educativo de una comunidad de larreynaga,  es soltera con 1 hijo al que tiene  que mantener las condiciones de desarrollo profesional, actualmente la señora Martha tiene una necesidad muy importante en lo que se refiere al mejoramiento de  la vivienda como es el piso, Techo y puertas, para ese efecto tomo la decisión de visitar las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiado con crédito para efectuar su gestión de mejoras en el objetivo planteado, con mira a mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida familiar, ya que dicho financiamiento será utilizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como: Cerámica, Perlin y Puertas.
texts.en:
Martha is a primary school teacher by profession. She currently holds a position as director of an educational centre in a community in Larreynaga. 

She is single and has one son who she needs to support whilst he completes his professional studies. At present Martha has one important need which is the improvement of her home and the condition of the floor, ceiling and doors. For this reason she made the decision to visit the offices of Ceprodel to obtain a loan to carry out the improvements she intends to make, with the hope of improving her conditions and her familiy’s quality of life. The loan will be used for the purchase of construction materials such as Ceramic, Purlin beams and doors.

loans.use: to buy ceramic, Purlin beams and doors to improve the floor, ceiling and doors.

loans.name: Bartolome

texts.es: Bartolomé de sesenta años de edad vive junto a su familia, en su humilde casa en zona rural, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, maicillo, frijol, huerta de guineos; tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas, tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Bartolomé es una buena persona, trabajador, honesto y responsable, cualquier vecino da buenas referencias de él, es muy visionario y desea un futuro próspero por eso quiere esforzarse al máximo; en este periodo de siembra quiere aumentar la producción  pues solo así aumentará las ganancias. Para invertir en insumos necesita de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar una bomba achicadora de agua, necesaria para extraer agua y la cual ingeniosamente pretende ocupar para regadillo de sus cultivos, semilla de maíz, frijol, abonos y herbicidas. Bartolomé tiene buen record crediticio, recibe remesas de un hijo que se encuentra en el extranjero por lo que garantiza que podrá saldar su deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Bartolomé is 70 years old and lives with his family in their humble home in the rural area.  He works in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of corn, sorghum, beans, and a banana garden.  He has worked in this field for many years and he has a lot of experience that helps him obtain great harvests.  The land that he cultivates is in the area best known for agriculture and very close to the area in which he resides.  He sells his products in all of the surrounding areas and he has many customers that know his products are the best quality at the lowest prices.  Also, he provides excellent service.
